tool_description: Analyzes skin characteristics and concerns to determine primary skin type and specific needs for routine customization.

oiliness_level.description: Skin oiliness on scale 1-5 (1=very dry, 5=very oily)

sensitivity_level.description: Skin sensitivity on scale 1-5 (1=not sensitive, 5=very sensitive)

age_range.description: Age category: teens, twenties, thirties, forties, fifties_plus

error_messages: Invalid oiliness level: Must be integer between 1-5
Invalid sensitivity level: Must be integer between 1-5
Invalid age range: Use teens, twenties, thirties, forties, or fifties_plus
Invalid concerns array: Provide 1-5 skin concerns as strings
usage: Input skin oiliness and sensitivity levels (1-5 scale), age range, and primary skin concerns. Tool analyzes characteristics to determine skin type and specific needs.

priority_concerns.description: Ranked list of concerns to address
